thread.title: Trump Administration Defends Its Immigration Policies

author: Louise Radnofsky
title: Trump Administration Defends Its Immigration Policies
text:
WASHINGTONâ€“The White House on Tuesday cited a combination of court rulings and laws as the underpinning for its policy to separate immigrant children from their parents, and looked to shift the responsibility to Democrats in Congress.
The Trump administration has come under criticism for its policy of separating migrant children from their parents at the border, reversing a previous practice that families who cross the border seeking asylum were often released together into the U.S. while their cases are pursued.
...
